name: Sazae-oni
shortLoreBlurb: Sazae-oni is a monster from Japan associated with sea snail demon, trickster. Appeased with offerings to ensure safe crossings and rain. Stories teach caution through pranks that expose human folly.
overlapsLinks: Anansi (Akan), Coyote (Native American), Loki (Norse), Naga (India/SE Asia), Poseidon (Greek), Tangaroa (Polynesia), Yemaya (Yoruba)
description: Sazae-oni is a monster from Japan associated with sea snail demon, trickster. Appeased with offerings to ensure safe crossings and rain. Stories teach caution through pranks that expose human folly.
